title: Strengthening Artificial Intelligence Practical Competencies: Comparative Analysis of Attitude Learning Assessment Strategies for Mathematics Learning Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the differences between cognitive learning assessments (quizzes) and behavioral learning assessments (individual projects).
Learners can accurately diagnose their own attitude changes using a self-assessment scale with over 75% accuracy.
Learners can compare the strengths and weaknesses of the two assessment methods and select strategies appropriate to their learning context.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
